title.rendered: Real Madrid’s squad announced for the final against Liverpool, the names of Eden Hazard and Gareth Bale included

content.rendered:
Real Madrid have announced a 26-man squad for the final match, two days before the Champions League final. Belgium’s Eden Hazard and Wales’ Gareth Bale have been included in the squad for Paris. The final match of the Champions League will be played in Paris on Saturday night. Liverpool and Real Madrid will face each other in the final after 2018. Then Riyal won the match 3-1.

Real Madrid’s team will reach Paris on Thursday. At the same time, the players of Liverpool will go on Friday. Liverpool manager Jorgen Klopp will soon announce the 26-man squad. Hazard and Bale have not played long this season due to injury. Carlo Ancelotti has been paying more attention to both since becoming manager of the club.

Bale has played for Rial seven times this season. The last time he got a chance to hit the ground was on April 9. This match could prove to be his last match with Rial. His contract expires on July 1. The departure of club captain Marcelo and Isco could happen after this season. It could be a match of both. Apart from these two, Dani Ceballos, Jesus Vallejo, Luca Jovic and Mariano Diaz can also leave the club.

Real Madrid’s team, adorned with star players, will not make much changes in the starting XI. Thibo Kourtva will take over the responsibility of goalkeeping. David Alba can be seen in the defence, along with Idar Militao, Ferland Mendy and Dani Carvahl. There are still question marks on Alba’s fitness. If he is fit, he will definitely play. Talking about the midfielders, Luka Moudrich and Toni Cruz will have a big responsibility. Striker Karim Benzima is likely to join hands with Vinicius Jr and Rodrigo.

Real Madrid Team:
Goalkeepers: Thibo Corteva, Andrey Lunin, Tony Fuidiaz Ribera.
Defenders: David Alba, Idar Militao, Nacho, Dani Carvahl, Ferland Mendy, Marcelo, Jess Vallejo.
Midfielders: Toni Cruz, Luca Moudrich, Casemiro, Federico Valverde, Eduardo Camavinga, Lucas Vasquez, Dani Ceballos, Isco.
Forwards: Karim Benzema, Vinicius Jr., Rodrigo, Gareth Bale, Eden Hazard, Marco Asensio, Luca Jovic, Mariano Diaz.
